about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: The game is far from being finished and is developed by myself as a single guy. Many graphics are just placeholders and more features will be added during the development.

Embark on an epic journey through ancient Rome in RES PUBLICA - Citizens of Rome. Begin as a humble plebeian and rise through the ranks to become a respected patrician. In RES PUBLICA, players take on the roles of powerful Roman families, competing to build the greatest city and achieve the most glory and influence. Each player starts with a unique character, representing their family's particular strengths and weaknesses, and an individual home that can be upgraded over time.

Players will use action points, gold and spend resources to construct buildings, hire workers, and gather more resources. As players build up their cities together, they will unlock new abilities and gain access to more powerful options. Upgrading your personal home is crucial, as it provides additional benefits and reflects your rising status in Roman society.

Players must carefully manage their resources, balancing their desire for more powerful structures with the need to keep their workers fed and their finances stable. They must also keep an eye on their opponents, sabotaging their plans and disrupting their progress.

Produce over 50 different goods in a variety of buildings, each with its own unique benefits. Trade with diverse cities, form caravans, and establish lucrative trade routes to grow your influence and wealth in the Roman world.

As the game progresses, players will build their own unique version of a Roman city, with districts, buildings, and structures that reflect their strategic vision.

Your home will evolve from a simple dwelling to a grand villa, showcasing your success and offering new gameplay advantages. Upgrade various rooms and features to enhance your living space, improve your family's status, and unlock unique bonuses. Customize and expand your domus, turning it into a luxurious haven that reflects your achievements and strategic prowess in ancient Rome.

The ultimate goal is to amass the most influence and power, cementing your family's place as one of the most powerful in all of Rome.

Experience the thrill of the gladiator games in ancient Rome. As a player, you can visit and host spectacular gladiator battles, placing bets on your favorite fighters and watching the intense action unfold in the arena. Engage with the games through interactive choices, influencing the outcome and enhancing the excitement of the spectacle.

Current Features

  • Innovative mix of a board game, classic city-builder and life simulation.

  • Build and design your City, based on a beautiful Hex-Tile Map.

  • Unique 3D Interiors for all buildings.

  • Over 30 Resources to produce and trade.

  • Deep Population System with 4 social classes. Each with its own needs, demands and professions.

  • Manage your workspace and workers.

  • Seasons with different effects on production and your population.

  • Create and manage your own Character. Unlock new Traits and Actions.

  • Innovative Patronus System (your personal gods) to unlock new technologies, professions and more.

  • Build and Upgrade your personal home, assign servants, host events and explore your home in first person.

  • Interactive tutorial that will teach you how to play.

Enhance your streaming experience with our planned Twitch integration. Streamers can engage their viewers and followers in real-time by involving them in political elections, special events, and more, creating a dynamic and interactive gameplay experience.

  • Military: In times of war, you can join the legion. Fight in the legion and rise in rank. This is the first step in starting your political career.

  • Roman Politics: Take part in the Cursus Honorum and gain a powerful political office.

  • Gods & Religion: Praise the gods and gain their support.

  • Multiplayer: Challenge other players around the globe. Online & Hotseat!

  • Map Editor: Design your own maps and share them with others.

short_description: RES PUBLICA - Citizens of Rome, an innovative city builder, life-simulation and roleplay game, invites the player to build his own roman city, manage his character, family and household during the ancient Roman Republic in 150 BC. Ave Caesar! Its up to you to lead the way for your home and family!
